name: uiproject
description:
**

People review app:

** A fun review app of people. Users create profiles and post urls of there social media accounts in there bio so people can put a username to a face and leave comments of what they think about the person. Comments can be created, edited, and deleted. Comments have a username attached to them. You can comment on your own profile. You can delete peoples comments on your page.
author: Brett Nguyen
